Smooth Minimization (Nesterov, 2004) -- Section 04 -- Part 5

The softmax vector belongs to the standard simplex (and its normalizer is positive).

lemma entropySimplex_softmax_den_pos_and_mem (m : ) ( : ) (s : Fin m ) (hm : 0 < m) : let Z : := j : Fin m, Real.exp (s j / ) 0 < Z (fun j : Fin m => Real.exp (s j / ) / Z) standardSimplex m := by classical dsimp set Z : := j : Fin m, Real.exp (s j / ) with hZ have hZpos : 0 < Z := by simpa [hZ] using entropySimplex_softmax_den_pos (m := m) ( := ) (s := s) hm have hZne : Z 0 := ne_of_gt hZpos refine hZpos, ?_ refine ?_, ?_ intro j have : 0 < Real.exp (s j / ) / Z := div_pos (Real.exp_pos (s j / )) hZpos exact le_of_lt (by simpa [hZ] using this) have hsum_div : ( j : Fin m, Real.exp (s j / ) / Z) = ( j : Fin m, Real.exp (s j / )) / Z := by simpa using (Finset.sum_div (s := (Finset.univ : Finset (Fin m))) (f := fun j => Real.exp (s j / )) (a := Z)).symm calc ( j : Fin m, Real.exp (s j / ) / Z) = ( j : Fin m, Real.exp (s j / )) / Z := hsum_div _ = Z / Z := by simp [hZ] _ = (1 : ) := by simp [hZne]

Scalar inequality underlying KL nonnegativity: for Unknown identifier `u`sorry > 0 : Propu > 0, Unknown identifier `v`sorry 0 : Propv 0.

lemma entropySimplex_mul_log_div_ge_sub {u v : } (hu : 0 < u) (hv : 0 v) : v * Real.log (v / u) v - u := by by_cases hv0 : v = 0 subst hv0 simp [hu.le] have hvpos : 0 < v := lt_of_le_of_ne hv (Ne.symm hv0) have hx : 0 < u / v := div_pos hu hvpos have hlog : Real.log (u / v) u / v - 1 := Real.log_le_sub_one_of_pos hx have hv' : 0 < v := hvpos have hmul : v * Real.log (u / v) v * (u / v - 1) := by exact mul_le_mul_of_nonneg_left hlog (le_of_lt hv') have hmul' : v * (u / v - 1) = u - v := by calc v * (u / v - 1) = v * (u / v) - v := by ring _ = u - v := by simp [mul_div_cancel u hv0] have hbase : -(v * Real.log (u / v)) v - u := by have : v * Real.log (u / v) u - v := by simpa [hmul'] using hmul linarith -- rewrite `-log(u/v)` as `log(v/u)` have hloginv : Real.log (v / u) = -Real.log (u / v) := by simpa [inv_div] using (Real.log_inv (u / v)) -- finalize have : v * Real.log (v / u) = -(v * Real.log (u / v)) := by calc v * Real.log (v / u) = v * (-Real.log (u / v)) := by simp [hloginv] _ = -(v * Real.log (u / v)) := by ring simpa [this] using hbase

Rewrite as Unknown identifier `v`sorry * sorry - sorry * sorry : ?m.15v * Unknown identifier `log`log v - Unknown identifier `v`v * Unknown identifier `log`log u (handles Unknown identifier `v`sorry = 0 : Propv = 0 by cases).

lemma entropySimplex_mul_log_div_eq (u v : ) (hu : u 0) : v * Real.log (v / u) = v * Real.log v - v * Real.log u := by by_cases hv0 : v = 0 subst hv0 simp have hv : v 0 := hv0 simp [Real.log_div hv hu, mul_sub]

Nonnegativity of the KL divergence on the simplex against a positive Unknown identifier `u`u.

lemma entropySimplex_KL_nonneg {m : } {v u : Fin m } (hv : v standardSimplex m) (hu_pos : j, 0 < u j) (hu_sum : j, u j = (1 : )) : 0 j : Fin m, v j * Real.log (v j / u j) := by classical have hv_nonneg : j, 0 v j := hv.1 have hv_sum : j, v j = (1 : ) := hv.2 have hterm : j : Fin m, v j - u j v j * Real.log (v j / u j) := by intro j have := entropySimplex_mul_log_div_ge_sub (u := u j) (v := v j) (hu := hu_pos j) (hv := hv_nonneg j) linarith have hsum : ( j : Fin m, (v j - u j)) j : Fin m, v j * Real.log (v j / u j) := by have : (Finset.univ.sum fun j : Fin m => v j - u j) (Finset.univ.sum fun j : Fin m => v j * Real.log (v j / u j)) := by refine Finset.sum_le_sum ?_ intro j hj exact hterm j simpa using this have hleft0 : ( j : Fin m, (v j - u j)) = 0 := by have hsub : ( j : Fin m, (v j - u j)) = ( j : Fin m, v j) - ( j : Fin m, u j) := by simp [Finset.sum_sub_distrib] calc ( j : Fin m, (v j - u j)) = ( j : Fin m, v j) - ( j : Fin m, u j) := hsub _ = (1 : ) - (1 : ) := by simp [hv_sum, hu_sum] _ = 0 := by ring simpa [hleft0] using hsum

lemma entropySimplex_obj_at_softmax (m : ) ( : ) (s : Fin m ) (hm : 0 < m) (h : 0 < ) : let Z : := j : Fin m, Real.exp (s j / ) let u : Fin m := fun j => Real.exp (s j / ) / Z ( j, u j * s j) - * ( j, u j * Real.log (u j)) = * Real.log Z := by classical dsimp set Z : := j : Fin m, Real.exp (s j / ) with hZ set u : Fin m := fun j => Real.exp (s j / ) / Z with hu have hZpos : 0 < Z := by simpa [hZ] using entropySimplex_softmax_den_pos (m := m) ( := ) (s := s) hm have hZne : Z 0 := ne_of_gt hZpos have hu_mem : u standardSimplex m := by have h := entropySimplex_softmax_den_pos_and_mem (m := m) ( := ) (s := s) hm simpa [hZ, hu] using h.2 have hu_sum : j : Fin m, u j = (1 : ) := hu_mem.2 have hne : 0 := ne_of_gt h have hlog_u : j : Fin m, Real.log (u j) = s j / - Real.log Z := by intro j have hexp : Real.exp (s j / ) 0 := Real.exp_ne_zero (s j / ) simp [hu, Real.log_div hexp hZne, Real.log_exp, sub_eq_add_neg] have hsum_log : ( j : Fin m, u j * Real.log (u j)) = ( j : Fin m, u j * (s j / )) - Real.log Z := by calc ( j : Fin m, u j * Real.log (u j)) = j : Fin m, u j * (s j / - Real.log Z) := by refine Finset.sum_congr rfl ?_ intro j hj simp [hlog_u j] _ = j : Fin m, (u j * (s j / ) - u j * Real.log Z) := by refine Finset.sum_congr rfl ?_ intro j hj ring _ = ( j : Fin m, u j * (s j / )) - ( j : Fin m, u j * Real.log Z) := by simp [Finset.sum_sub_distrib] _ = ( j : Fin m, u j * (s j / )) - (Real.log Z * ( j : Fin m, u j)) := by congr 1 calc ( j : Fin m, u j * Real.log Z) = j : Fin m, (Real.log Z) * u j := by refine Finset.sum_congr rfl ?_ intro j hj ring _ = (Real.log Z) * ( j : Fin m, u j) := by simp [Finset.mul_sum] _ = ( j : Fin m, u j * (s j / )) - Real.log Z := by simp [hu_sum] have hmu_cancel : * ( j : Fin m, u j * (s j / )) = j : Fin m, u j * s j := by calc * ( j : Fin m, u j * (s j / )) = j : Fin m, * (u j * (s j / )) := by simp [Finset.mul_sum] _ = j : Fin m, u j * s j := by refine Finset.sum_congr rfl ?_ intro j hj calc * (u j * (s j / )) = u j * ( * (s j / )) := by ring _ = u j * s j := by simp [mul_div_cancel (s j) hne] calc ( j : Fin m, u j * s j) - * ( j : Fin m, u j * Real.log (u j)) = ( j : Fin m, u j * s j) - * (( j : Fin m, u j * (s j / )) - Real.log Z) := by simp [hsum_log] _ = ( j : Fin m, u j * s j) - * ( j : Fin m, u j * (s j / )) + * Real.log Z := by ring _ = * Real.log Z := by -- the linear term cancels with the entropy term using ` 0` simp [hmu_cancel]

Any point of the simplex achieves objective value at most the softmax value .

lemma entropySimplex_obj_le_softmax (m : ) ( : ) (s : Fin m ) (hm : 0 < m) (h : 0 < ) : let Z : := j : Fin m, Real.exp (s j / ) let _u : Fin m := fun j => Real.exp (s j / ) / Z v standardSimplex m, ( j, v j * s j) - * ( j, v j * Real.log (v j)) * Real.log Z := by classical dsimp set Z : := j : Fin m, Real.exp (s j / ) with hZ set u : Fin m := fun j => Real.exp (s j / ) / Z with hu have hZpos : 0 < Z := by simpa [hZ] using entropySimplex_softmax_den_pos (m := m) ( := ) (s := s) hm have hZne : Z 0 := ne_of_gt hZpos have hu_mem : u standardSimplex m := by have h := entropySimplex_softmax_den_pos_and_mem (m := m) ( := ) (s := s) hm simpa [hZ, hu] using h.2 have hu_sum : j : Fin m, u j = (1 : ) := hu_mem.2 have hu_pos : j : Fin m, 0 < u j := by intro j have : 0 < Real.exp (s j / ) / Z := div_pos (Real.exp_pos (s j / )) hZpos simpa [hu] using this have hne : 0 := ne_of_gt h have hlog_u : j : Fin m, Real.log (u j) = s j / - Real.log Z := by intro j have hexp : Real.exp (s j / ) 0 := Real.exp_ne_zero (s j / ) simp [hu, Real.log_div hexp hZne, Real.log_exp, sub_eq_add_neg] have hs_div : j : Fin m, s j / = Real.log (u j) + Real.log Z := by intro j have := hlog_u j linarith intro v hv have hv_sum : j : Fin m, v j = (1 : ) := hv.2 have hlin : ( j : Fin m, v j * s j) = * ( j : Fin m, v j * (s j / )) := by calc ( j : Fin m, v j * s j) = j : Fin m, v j * ( * (s j / )) := by refine Finset.sum_congr rfl ?_ intro j hj simp [mul_div_cancel (s j) hne, mul_comm] _ = j : Fin m, * (v j * (s j / )) := by refine Finset.sum_congr rfl ?_ intro j hj ring _ = * ( j : Fin m, v j * (s j / )) := by simp [Finset.mul_sum] have hsum_sdiv : ( j : Fin m, v j * (s j / )) = ( j : Fin m, v j * Real.log (u j)) + Real.log Z := by calc ( j : Fin m, v j * (s j / )) = j : Fin m, v j * (Real.log (u j) + Real.log Z) := by refine Finset.sum_congr rfl ?_ intro j hj simp [hs_div j] _ = j : Fin m, (v j * Real.log (u j) + v j * Real.log Z) := by refine Finset.sum_congr rfl ?_ intro j hj ring _ = ( j : Fin m, v j * Real.log (u j)) + ( j : Fin m, v j * Real.log Z) := by simp [Finset.sum_add_distrib] _ = ( j : Fin m, v j * Real.log (u j)) + (Real.log Z * ( j : Fin m, v j)) := by congr 1 calc ( j : Fin m, v j * Real.log Z) = j : Fin m, (Real.log Z) * v j := by refine Finset.sum_congr rfl ?_ intro j hj ring _ = (Real.log Z) * ( j : Fin m, v j) := by simp [Finset.mul_sum] _ = ( j : Fin m, v j * Real.log (u j)) + Real.log Z := by simp [hv_sum] have hsum_logdiv : ( j : Fin m, v j * Real.log (v j / u j)) = ( j : Fin m, v j * Real.log (v j)) - ( j : Fin m, v j * Real.log (u j)) := by calc ( j : Fin m, v j * Real.log (v j / u j)) = j : Fin m, (v j * Real.log (v j) - v j * Real.log (u j)) := by refine Finset.sum_congr rfl ?_ intro j hj have huj : u j 0 := ne_of_gt (hu_pos j) simp [entropySimplex_mul_log_div_eq (u := u j) (v := v j) huj] _ = ( j : Fin m, v j * Real.log (v j)) - ( j : Fin m, v j * Real.log (u j)) := by simp [Finset.sum_sub_distrib] have hkl : 0 j : Fin m, v j * Real.log (v j / u j) := by exact entropySimplex_KL_nonneg (hv := hv) (hu_pos := hu_pos) (hu_sum := hu_sum) have hdiff : 0 * Real.log Z - (( j : Fin m, v j * s j) - * ( j : Fin m, v j * Real.log (v j))) := by have : * Real.log Z - (( j : Fin m, v j * s j) - * ( j : Fin m, v j * Real.log (v j))) = * ( j : Fin m, v j * Real.log (v j / u j)) := by calc * Real.log Z - (( j : Fin m, v j * s j) - * ( j : Fin m, v j * Real.log (v j))) = * Real.log Z - ( j : Fin m, v j * s j) + * ( j : Fin m, v j * Real.log (v j)) := by ring _ = * Real.log Z - * ( j : Fin m, v j * (s j / )) + * ( j : Fin m, v j * Real.log (v j)) := by simp [hlin] _ = * (Real.log Z - ( j : Fin m, v j * (s j / )) + ( j : Fin m, v j * Real.log (v j))) := by ring _ = * (( j : Fin m, v j * Real.log (v j)) - ( j : Fin m, v j * Real.log (u j))) := by congr 1 simp [hsum_sdiv] ring _ = * ( j : Fin m, v j * Real.log (v j / u j)) := by simp [hsum_logdiv] have hdiff_nonneg : 0 * ( j : Fin m, v j * Real.log (v j / u j)) := mul_nonneg (le_of_lt h) hkl simpa [this] using hdiff_nonneg exact (sub_nonneg.mp hdiff)

Lemma 1.4.1.2. theorem entropySimplex_softmax_maximizer (m : ) ( : ) (s : Fin m ) (hm : 0 < m) (h : 0 < ) : let : := sSup ((fun u => ( j, u j * s j) - * ( j, u j * Real.log (u j))) '' standardSimplex m) let u : Fin m := fun j => Real.exp (s j / ) / ( l, Real.exp (s l / )) u standardSimplex m ( v standardSimplex m, ( j, v j * s j) - * ( j, v j * Real.log (v j)) ( j, u j * s j) - * ( j, u j * Real.log (u j))) = * Real.log ( j, Real.exp (s j / )) := by classical dsimp set Z : := j : Fin m, Real.exp (s j / ) with hZ set u : Fin m := fun j => Real.exp (s j / ) / Z with hu have hZpos : 0 < Z := by simpa [hZ] using entropySimplex_softmax_den_pos (m := m) ( := ) (s := s) hm have hu_mem : u standardSimplex m := by have h := entropySimplex_softmax_den_pos_and_mem (m := m) ( := ) (s := s) hm simpa [hZ, hu] using h.2 have hu_obj : ( j : Fin m, u j * s j) - * ( j : Fin m, u j * Real.log (u j)) = * Real.log Z := by have h := entropySimplex_obj_at_softmax (m := m) ( := ) (s := s) hm h simpa [hZ, hu] using h have hupper : v standardSimplex m, ( j : Fin m, v j * s j) - * ( j : Fin m, v j * Real.log (v j)) ( j : Fin m, u j * s j) - * ( j : Fin m, u j * Real.log (u j)) := by intro v hv have hv_le : ( j : Fin m, v j * s j) - * ( j : Fin m, v j * Real.log (v j)) * Real.log Z := by have h := entropySimplex_obj_le_softmax (m := m) ( := ) (s := s) hm h simpa [hZ, hu] using h v hv -- rewrite the softmax objective as ` * log Z` simpa [hu_obj] using hv_le refine by simpa [hu, hZ] using hu_mem, hupper, ?_ -- identify the supremum with the objective value at `u` set S : Set := ((fun u : Fin m => ( j : Fin m, u j * s j) - * ( j : Fin m, u j * Real.log (u j))) '' standardSimplex m) with hS have hS_nonempty : S.Nonempty := by refine ( j : Fin m, u j * s j) - * ( j : Fin m, u j * Real.log (u j)), ?_ refine u, ?_, rfl simpa [hS] using hu_mem have hS_bdd : BddAbove S := by refine ( j : Fin m, u j * s j) - * ( j : Fin m, u j * Real.log (u j)), ?_ intro y hy rcases hy with v, hv, rfl exact hupper v hv have hsSup_eq : sSup S = ( j : Fin m, u j * s j) - * ( j : Fin m, u j * Real.log (u j)) := by refine le_antisymm ?_ ?_ -- `sSup S obj(u)` since `obj(u)` is an upper bound on the image refine csSup_le hS_nonempty ?_ intro y hy rcases hy with v, hv, rfl exact hupper v hv -- `obj(u) sSup S` since `obj(u) S` refine le_csSup hS_bdd ?_ refine u, ?_, rfl simpa [hS] using hu_mem -- finish by evaluating at the softmax point have : sSup S = * Real.log Z := by simp [hsSup_eq, hu_obj] simpa [hS, hZ] using this

Proposition 1.4.1.3. In the matrix-game setting (4.10), under the entropy-distance setup of Lemma 1.4.1.2, the smoothed objective (4.1) for the primal problem is , with the minimization (eq:matrixgame_smooth).

theorem matrixGame_smoothedObjective_explicit (n m : ) (A : (Fin n ) L[] ((Fin m ) L[] )) (c : Fin n ) (b : Fin m ) ( : ) (h : 0 < ) : let fhat : (Fin n ) := fun x => i, c i * x i let phihat : (Fin m ) := fun u => - j, b j * u j let d2 : (Fin m ) := fun u => Real.log (m : ) + j, u j * Real.log (u j) let fbar : (Fin n ) := SmoothedObjective (standardSimplex m) A phihat d2 fhat fbar = fun x => ( i, c i * x i) + * Real.log ((1 / (m : )) * j, Real.exp (((A x) (fun k => if k = j then (1 : ) else 0) + b j) / )) := by classical funext x by_cases hm0 : m = 0 subst hm0 -- `_0` is empty, so the smoothed max-term is `sSup = 0`, and the RHS sum is empty. have hsimplex0 : (standardSimplex 0 : Set (Fin 0 )) = := by ext u simp [standardSimplex] simp [SmoothedObjective, SmoothedMaxFunction, Real.sSup_empty, standardSimplex] have hm : 0 < m := Nat.pos_of_ne_zero hm0 have hne : 0 := ne_of_gt h -- Evaluate the `sSup` in the smoothed max-function via the entropy simplex lemma. have hmax : SmoothedMaxFunction (standardSimplex m) A (fun u => - j : Fin m, b j * u j) (fun u : Fin m => Real.log (m : ) + j : Fin m, u j * Real.log (u j)) x = * Real.log ((1 / (m : )) * j : Fin m, Real.exp (((A x) (fun k : Fin m => if k = j then (1 : ) else 0) + b j) / )) := by set t : Fin m := fun j : Fin m => (A x) (fun k : Fin m => if k = j then (1 : ) else 0) + b j with ht set s : Fin m := fun j : Fin m => t j - * Real.log (m : ) with hs have himage : ((fun u : Fin m => A x u + ( j : Fin m, b j * u j) - * (Real.log (m : ) + j : Fin m, u j * Real.log (u j))) '' standardSimplex m) = ((fun u : Fin m => ( j : Fin m, u j * s j) - * ( j : Fin m, u j * Real.log (u j))) '' standardSimplex m)) = * Real.log ( j : Fin m, Real.exp (s j / )) := by have h := entropySimplex_softmax_maximizer (m := m) ( := ) (s := s) hm h simpa using h.2.2 have hshift : ( j : Fin m, Real.exp (s j / )) = (1 / (m : )) * j : Fin m, Real.exp (((A x) (fun k : Fin m => if k = j then (1 : ) else 0) + b j) / ) := by have hterm : ( j : Fin m, Real.exp (s j / )) = (1 / (m : )) * j : Fin m, Real.exp (t j / ) := by have : ( j : Fin m, Real.exp (s j / )) = ( j : Fin m, Real.exp ((t j - * Real.log (m : )) / )) := by refine Finset.sum_congr rfl ?_ intro j hj simp [s] -- apply the shift lemma and rewrite `t` simpa [this, div_eq_mul_inv, one_div, mul_assoc, mul_left_comm, mul_comm] using (matrixGame_logsumexp_shift_by_log_m (m := m) ( := ) (t := t) hm hne) -- unfold `t` in the RHS simp [t, hterm] simp [SmoothedMaxFunction, himage, hentropy, hshift] simp [SmoothedObjective, hmax]
